docs.text: 📝 Homework ✨ 我的解答 1. 由 $$ f(p) = 0 $$ 知 $$ p^4 = -2p^2 + p + 3, 2p^2 = -p^4 + p + 3, $$ 则 $$ g_1(p) = (3 + p - 2p^2)^{1/4} = (p^4)^{1/4} = p, $$ $$ g_2(p) = ((p + 3 - p^4)/2)^{1/2} = (p^2)^{1/2} = p, $$ $$ Q.E.D. $$ 2. $$ g(x) = \pi + 0.5\sin(x/2), x \in [0, 2\pi], $$ 则 $$ g(x) \in [\pi, \pi + 0.5] \subset [0, 2\pi]. $$ 又 $$ |\frac{dg}{dx}| = |0.25\cos(x/2)| \leq 0.25 < 1, $$ $$ 故函数\,g(x)\,在\,[0, 2\pi]\,上有唯一的不动点. $$ fixed-point interation : function [res, iteration] = fixed_point_iteration(f, TOL, p0, N0) arguments f {mustBefuntionHandle} TOL p0 N0 end p_pre = p0; i = 0; p = p0; while i < N0 p_pre = p; p = f(p); if abs(p-p_pre) < TOL res = p; iteration = i + 1; return end i = i + 1; end res = NaN; iteration = i; disp("the method was unsuccessful."); end function mustBefuntionHandle(f) if ~isa(f, "function_handle") error("function handle was request"); end end function res = target_fun2(x) res = pi + 0.5*sin(x/2) end clc; clear; TOL = 10^-2; N0 = 1000; p0 = pi; target_func2 = @target_fun2; [p, iteration] = fixed_point_interation(target_func2, TOL, p0, N0); disp(p); disp(iteration); 运行得到 $$ p = 3.6270, iteration = 3. $$ $$ |p-p_n| \leq \frac{k^n}{1-k}|p_1 - p_0|, $$ 令 $$ |p-p_n| = 10^{-2}, |p_1 - p_0| = 0.5000, k = 0.25, $$ 解得: $$ n \leq 3 $$ $$ |p-p_n| \leq k^n \max{(p_0 - a, p_0 - b)}, $$ 令 $$ |p-p_n| = 10^{-2}, \max{(p_0 - a, p_0 - b)} = \pi, k = 0.25, $$ 解得: $$ n \leq 4 $$ 这与实际迭代次数 3 符合. 3. $$ 2\sin(\pi x) + x = 0, $$ 等价于 $$ x = 1/\pi \arcsin(-x/2) + 2, x \in [1.5,2], $$ $$ x = -1/\pi \arcsin(-x/2) + 1, x \in [1,1.5). $$ 定义目标函数: function res = target_func3(x) if x >= 1.5 res = (1/pi) * asin(-x/2) + 2; else res = -(1/pi) * asin(-x/2) + 1; end end 迭代： clc; clear; TOL = 10^-4; N0 = 1000; p0 = 1; target_func3 = @target_func3; [p, iteration, diff] = fixed_point_interation(target_func3, TOL, p0, N0); disp(p); 输出得到： $$ p = 1.2060. $$
